response.overview: Pavel Astakhov, the presenter and author of the program "Simple Miracles", drove along the front line, collecting people's stories about their meeting with God in the war – unique first-hand accounts of saved lives, unexploded shells, survival against all odds, how shrines were protected from bullets and bombs, and minefields did not explode about how the laws of nature and the effects of explosive waves were violated, about the abundant myrrh of Donbass icons, about the power of prayer and the multiplication of battalions with the names of saints on the front line.
response.title: A Miracle in the War
